revised_title: The Plantas: A Historical Overview of a Notable Family in the Royal Society
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of the Plantas family, tracing their history from the Roman era to their significant roles in the Royal Society and the British Museum. The family's notable members include Andreas Joseph Planta, who served as a pastor, professor, and librarian, and his son Joseph Planta, who became the Secretary and Principal Librarian of the British Museum.
